CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) measurements were carried out to determine the HOMO and LUMO levels of the polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. Cyclic voltammetry (CV): This is a technique or method used for making electrochemical measurements. It is not a material itself, but rather an analytical method used to determine the HOMO and LUMO levels of polymers.
2. Polymers: These are the materials whose HOMO and LUMO levels are being determined using cyclic voltammetry.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) measurements were carried out to determine the HOMO and LUMO levels of the polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. Cyclic voltammetry (CV): This is a technique or method used for making the measurements.
2. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) levels: These are the energy levels of the last electrons to be filled in a molecule.
3. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) levels: These are the energy levels of the first electrons to be excited in a molecule.

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are HOMO levels and LUMO levels.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. HOMO levels
2. LUMO levels

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| LUMO levels |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) measurements were carried out to determine the HOMO and LUMO levels of the polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) level
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) level
3. Levels (in general, referring to HOMO and LUMO energy levels)
4. Energy levels (similar to "levels," but could also refer to other types of energy levels)

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are the HOMO and LUMO energy levels of the polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

HOMO level (energy value)
LUMO level (energy value)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO level |
| LUMO level |
